price: 51. Kaadu seehadaytuh qaafiyat kee gaddaliinot namqe waqdi, derre cabaah, kaxxa-mariinoh moyya karerri haa cakkih rammitaamak, kaadu umaané kaa xagta waqdi tokkel usuk kaxxa xaaqo-li yakke.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu fadhū duʿāin ʿarīḍin
